## Detailed Examples

Analysis of some common business problems in depth, and how they may apply to your business.

-   External factors can affect your business, and it is important to know how. [Here](renovations.html) we show how a competitor doing renovations on *their* shop could affect
    *your* sales!  

-   Are you growing your customer base? [Here](donorbase.html) we show an example where the customer base was growing, but is now shrinking.
